title: FEA Poisson Extractor
description: IronPython script for Ansys ACT with a GUI that automates the entire process of Poisson's ratio calculation.

title: Portfolio Website
description: My personal portfolio built with HTML, Tailwind, and DaisyUI. Includes dynamic effects, cards, and animations.

title: SAP Data Visualizer
description: A tool for visualizing and analyzing data exported from SAP systems using interactive dashboards.

title: 2D FEA Solver
description: A custom 2D finite element method solver written in C, capable of analyzing static problems on triangular meshes.

title: Budget Manager App
description: Simple JS web app that helps users track income and expenses with dynamic charts and category tagging.
